results.content: Great kick-start into React, particularly if you are already proficient with another front-end UI framework or library (Angular 2+ here). I really liked the Firebase addition, something I definitely plan to use for personal projects.
results.content_html: Great kick-start into React, particularly if you are already proficient with another front-end UI framework or library (Angular 2+ here). I really liked the Firebase addition, something I definitely plan to use for personal projects.

results.content: Well you will build a very basic PWA and is pretty much focused on React than PWA. Consider this before buying this course.

response.content: Thank you Erick. I Believe the course title says "Learn React" + "by building a Progressive Web App". Not sure, what else you expected. Also, did I mention anything else in the section "What you'll learn"?
